strDesc:
[Western Music]
"Who do you think you are, the Sheriff of outer Space?"
[Dramatic Pause]
"Yes."
And now so can you, with the NEW Cattleman N.e.o. Western Boot by ShooS. Rugged, time-tested design meets space age engineering and materials to provide you with everything a hardworking spacer could want in a boot, all yours for less than a tall drink of water. Offer valid while supplies last. Get yours today!
